=== CWA Data Synchronization Tool ===

This tool can be used to align CWA sensor data.

E.g. mark the beginning and the end of a recording by shaking
the two or more sensors together. There can be several shaking marks
in the one file, but there have to be at least two.

=== Requirements ===

The software was tested with Python 2.6 and 2.7.

You need the following Python modules:

 + PyQt4
   http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt/download
   
 + NumPy
   http://new.scipy.org/download.html
   
 + matplotlib
   http://sourceforge.net/projects/matplotlib/files/matplotlib/matplotlib-1.0/
   
== Installation on Ubuntu ==

 $ sudo apt-get install python-qt4 python-numpy python-matplotlib
